title: A Record $11B Crypto Options Expiry Looms as BTC Shows Little Volatility
description: The expiry is Deribit's largest so far and a record of almost $5 billion of options will expire in the money.

title: JPMorgan’s share of US bank profits leaves competitors stunned
description: In the ever-competitive world of banking, JPMorgan Chase has emerged as a towering figure, capturing a significant share of US bank profits in the first nine months of 2023. title: Hacker drains over $1m from Levana Protocol
description: In an X thread, Levana said the attacker succeeded in draining approximately 10% of its liquidity pools. Decentralized finance startup Levana Protocol suffered a security exploit, resulting in a loss of $1.14 million. The project’s statement on X revealed that…

title: Crypto vs. traditional finance: what investments performed better in 2023
description: Today’s investors face many options beyond stocks and bonds, with crypto vs. traditional finance becoming an increasingly common discourse. title: Binance Coin Skyrockets to $322.82 as Binance Boosts ADA and XRP with New Trading Pairs
description: Binance Coin is on a recovery path fueled by new ADA and XRP-listed pairs. Binance is navigating regulatory uncertainty as it jostles to widen its market support. title: From Web1 to Web3: A Journey of Data Liberation With Mikael Björn, CTO, Hashgraph Association
description:
Based in Switzerland, The Hashgraph Association is an organization focused on building an innovative ecosystem for startups, enterprises, and government institutions around the world by leveraging the capabilities of Hedera Hashgraph to design and develop enterprise-grade solutions and decentralized applications. The Coin Edition team had the opportunity to interview Mikael Björn, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) […]

title: Ether (ETH) Breaks Out, Propelling 22.7% Rally for AAVE
description:
The concern about Ether’s (ETH) struggles to breakout has finally been put to rest as the coin jumped above $2,400 on December 27.
